english: Were you never unfaithful to him before ?
chinese: 你以前从来没有对不起他过？

english: I 'm sorry to bring you so much trouble .
chinese: 对不起，给你添了很多麻烦。

english: I am sorry i snapped at you just now .
chinese: 对不起，我刚才不该对你嚷嚷。

english: Sorry , did i knock your elbow ?
chinese: 对不起，我是不是撞到你的胳膊肘了？

english: "i beg your pardon, sir," said oliver .

chinese: 对不起造句挺难的，這是一个万能造句的方法

english: Sorry , the larger ones are all sold out .
chinese: 对不起，大号的都卖完了。

english: I 'm sorry , i did n't do it on purpose .
chinese: 对不起，我不是存心这么做的。

english: Sorry , i did not quite catch what you said .
chinese: 对不起，我没听清你的话。

english: Sorry to take up so much of your time .
chinese: 对不起，占了你这么多时间。

english: I am sorry , that table is reserved .
chinese: 对不起，那张桌子有人预定了。

english: Sorry , i left my credit card at home .
chinese: 对不起，我把信用卡落在家里了。

english: By your allowance , i 'd like to leave before you .
I 'm sorry to have caused you so much trouble .
chinese: 对不起，给你们找麻烦了。

english: I haven't the pleasure of knowing you .
chinese: 对不起，我还不认识你呢。

english: Sorry. i didn't mean to carry on so .
chinese: 对不起，我本不想说这些事。
